forum/confirm_delete_post: Are you sure you want to delete this post?
forum/confirm_delete_topic: Are you sure you want to delete this topic?
forum/confirm_unfollow_all_topics: Are you sure you want to unfollow all topics?
forum/content_max_50000: Your post content must be no longer than 50000 characters
forum/content_min_2: Your post content must be a minimum of 2 characters
forum/default_labels_info: These will be assigned to a new topic in the forum unless overridden during topic creation. Ctrl+Click to select multiple
forum/display_topics_as_news: Display topics as news on front page?
forum/error_quoting_posts: Sorry, there was an error quoting those posts.
forum/forum_description_maximum: The forum description must be a maximum of 255 characters.
forum/forum_icon_maximum: The forum icon must be a maximum of 256 characters.
forum/forum_name_maximum: The forum name must be a maximum of 150 characters.
forum/forum_name_minimum: The forum name must be a minimum of 2 characters.
forum/forum_redirect_warning: Notice: you are about to leave this site! Are you sure you want to proceed to {{url}}?
forum/include_in_hook: Include events from this forum in webhooks?
forum/invalid_redirect_url: You have enabled the forum redirect, but you have not entered a valid URL between {{min}} and {{max}} characters.
forum/invalid_search_query: Please enter a search query between {{min}} and {{max}} characters long.
forum/label_creation_error: Error creating a label. Please ensure the name is no longer than 32 characters and that you have specified a type.
forum/label_type_creation_error: Error creating a label type. Please ensure the name is no longer than 32 characters and that the HTML is no longer than 1024 characters.
forum/label_type_html_help: The HTML must include {x} as a placeholder for the label name
forum/merge_instructions: The thread to merge with must be within the same forum. Move a thread if necessary.
forum/no_label_types_defined: No label types have been defined yet.
forum/no_labels_defined: No labels have been defined yet.
forum/no_longer_following_topic: You are no longer following this topic, and will not be notified of any new replies.
forum/no_topics: No topics have been created yet.
forum/not_following_any_topics: You are not following any topics.
forum/now_following_topic: You are now following this topic, and will be notified of any new replies.
forum/post_already_reported: You have already reported this post!
forum/search_again_in_x_seconds: Please wait {{count}} seconds before searching again.
forum/spam_wait: Please wait {{count}} seconds before posting again.
forum/title_max_64: Your topic title must be no longer than 64 characters
forum/title_min_2: Your topic title must be a minimum of 2 characters
forum/topic_locked_notice: This topic is locked, but your permissions allow you to create a reply.
forum/user_no_posts: This user has not made any forum posts yet.
forum/user_tag: You have been tagged in a post.
forum/user_tag_info: You have been tagged in a post by {{author}}.
forum/label_type_in_use: Label type is being used, cannot be deleted.
forum/latest_posts_widget_cached: The latest posts widget is cached for one minute, your changes may not take effect immediately.
forum/news_items_max: Number of news items should be at least {{max}}
forum/news_items_min: Number of news items should be at least {{min}}
forum/news_items_front_page_limit: Number of news items to display on front page
